line.originaltext: 1 (8 pound) bone-in shank ham
4 cups water, or as needed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "4 cups water, or as needed")

line.originaltext: 1/2 cup honey
1/2 cup brown sugar
2 tablespoons liquid smoke flavoring
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 pinch ground cloves
Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).
Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).
Place ham in a roasting pan.
Place ham in a roasting pan.
Pour in water to a 2 inch depth.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1}, ing7, "watered ham", "2 inch depth")

line.originaltext: Cover with a tight fitting lid.
Bake for 6 to 8 hours in the preheated oven (all day or all night).
Remove from the oven, pour off drippings and reserve.
Remove from the oven, pour off drippings and reserve.
Debone ham, removing any excess fat as well, and return to the roasting pan.
Debone ham, removing any excess fat as well, and return to the roasting pan.
Skim fat from the top of the drippings, and discard.

line.originaltext: In a small bowl, mix one cup of the drippings with honey, brown sugar, liquid smoke, Worcestershire sauce and cloves.
